original_text: Then Jehoram passed over with his commanders and all his chariots, and he rose by night and struck the Edomites who had surrounded him and his chariot commanders.
korean_text: 여호람이 지휘관들과 모든 병거를 거느리고 출정하였더니 밤에 일어나서 자기를 에워싼 에돔 사람과 그 병거의 지휘관들을 쳤더라

sentences.original_text: Then Jehoram passed over with his commanders and all his chariots
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 여호람은 그의 지휘관들과 모든 병거들을 이끌고 건넜습니다.

sentences.original_text: he rose by night and struck the Edomites
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 밤에 일어나 에돔 사람들을 쳤습니다.

sentences.original_text: who had surrounded him and his chariot commanders
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 그의 병거 장관들을 에워싸고 있던
